alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CATTARAUGUS... SOUTHERN ERIE AND NORTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm producing a landspout over North Boston, or near Hamburg, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamburg, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Orchard Park, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Angola, North Collins, Ashford Hollow, Derby, East Concord, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, North Boston, Concord, Collins, and Holland. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 58. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
